00032 int SetNonBlocking(int s){
00033     int opts;
00034     opts=fcntl(s, F_GETFL);
00035     if(opts == -1)
00036     {
00037         d_log("fcntl(sock,GETFL)");
00038         exit(-1);
00039     }
00040     opts |= O_NONBLOCK;
00041     if(fcntl(s, F_SETFL, opts) == -1)
00042     {
00043         d_log("fcntl(sock,SETFL,opts)");
00044         exit(1);
00045     }
00046         return 0;
00047 }
00048 
00049 int SetUnsetBlocking(int s){
00050     int opts;
00051     opts=fcntl(s, F_GETFL, 0);
00052     if(opts == -1)
00053     {
00054         d_log("fcntl(sock,GETFL)");
00055         exit(-1);
00056     }
00057     if(fcntl(s, F_SETFL, opts & !O_NONBLOCK) == -1)
00058     {
00059         d_log("fcntl(sock,SETFL,opts)");
00060         exit(1);
00061     }
00062         return 0;
00063 }
00064 int new_socket_unix(void) {
00065     int sfd;
00066 
00067     if ((sfd = socket(AF_UNIX, SOCK_STREAM, 0)) == -1) {
00068         d_log("socket()");
00069         return -1;
00070     }
00071         SetNonBlocking(sfd);
00072 
00073     return sfd;
00074 }

00076 int server_socket_unix(void) {
00077     int sfd;
00078     struct linger ling = {0, 0};
00079     struct sockaddr_un addr;
00080     struct stat tstat;
00081     int flags =1;
00082     int old_umask, access_mask = 0777;
00083         char *path;
00084         
00085         path = conf_get("path");
00086 
00087     if (!path) {
00088         return -1;
00089     }
00090 
00091     if ((sfd = new_socket_unix()) == -1) {
00092         return -1;
00093     }
00094 
00095     /*
00096      * Clean up a previous socket file if we left it around
00097      */
00098     if (lstat(path, &tstat) == 0) {
00099         if (S_ISSOCK(tstat.st_mode))
00100             unlink(path);
00101     }
00102 
00103     setsockopt(sfd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_REUSEADDR, (void *)&flags, sizeof(flags));
00104     setsockopt(sfd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_KEEPALIVE, (void *)&flags, sizeof(flags));
00105     setsockopt(sfd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_LINGER, (void *)&ling, sizeof(ling));
00106 
00107     /*
00108      * the memset call clears nonstandard fields in some impementations
00109      * that otherwise mess things up.
00110      */
00111     memset(&addr, 0, sizeof(addr));
00112 
00113     addr.sun_family = AF_UNIX;
00114     strncpy(addr.sun_path, path, sizeof(addr.sun_path) - 1);
00115     /*assert(strcmp(addr.sun_path, path) == 0);*/
00116     old_umask = umask( ~(access_mask&0777));
00117     if (bind(sfd, (struct sockaddr *)&addr, sizeof(addr)) == -1) {
00118         close(sfd);
00119         umask(old_umask);
00120         return 1;
00121     }
00122     umask(old_umask);
00123 
00124     if (listen(sfd, MAXCONN) == -1) {
00125         close(sfd);
00126         return 1;
00127     }
00128 
00129     return sfd;
00130 }

00132 int Set_SockOpt(int sockfd){
00133         socklen_t sendbuflen = 1024*1024;
00134     socklen_t len = sizeof(sendbuflen);
00135         struct linger opt;
00136         int nNetTimeout = 1;
00137     int flag = 1;
00138     int keepcnt = 5;
00139     int keepidle = 30;
00140     int keepintvl = 120;
00141 
00142         if (-1 == setsockopt(sockfd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_REUSEADDR, (void*)&sendbuflen, len)) {
00143                 d_log("Couldn't setsockopt(SO_REUSEADDR)\n");
00144                 return (-1);
00145         }
00146         
00147         if (-1 == setsockopt(sockfd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_SNDBUF, (void*)&sendbuflen, len )) {
00148                 d_log("Couldn't setsockopt(SO_SNDBUF)\n");
00149                 return (-1);
00150         }
00151 
00152         if (-1 == setsockopt(sockfd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_RCVBUF, (void*)&sendbuflen, len )) {
00153                 d_log("Couldn't setsockopt(SO_RCVBUF)\n");
00154                 return (-1);
00155         }
00156         
00157         setsockopt(sockfd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_SNDTIMEO, (char *)&nNetTimeout, sizeof(int));
00158         setsockopt(sockfd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_RCVTIMEO, (char *)&nNetTimeout, sizeof(int));
00159 
00160 
00161     /*
00162     setsockopt(sockfd, IPPROTO_TCP, TCP_KEEPCNT, &keepcnt, sizeof(int));
00163     setsockopt(sockfd, IPPROTO_TCP, TCP_KEEPIDLE, &keepidle, sizeof(int));
00164     setsockopt(sockfd, IPPROTO_TCP, TCP_KEEPINTVL, &keepintvl, sizeof(int));
00165 
00166     setsockopt(sockfd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_KEEPALIVE, (char *)&nNetTimeout, sizeof(int));
00167         setsockopt(sockfd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_NOSIGPIPE, (char *)&nNetTimeout, sizeof(int));*/
00168 
00169         opt.l_onoff = 1;
00170         opt.l_linger = 60;
00171 
00172         if (-1 == setsockopt(sockfd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_LINGER, &opt,
00173                 sizeof(struct linger))){
00174                 d_log("Coundn't setsockopt(SO_LINGER)\n");
00175                 return (-1);
00176         }
00177 
00178     if (setsockopt(sockfd, IPPROTO_TCP, TCP_NODELAY,
00179                   &flag, sizeof(flag)) == -1) {
00180         printf("noblock SockOpt\n");
00181                 return (-1);
00182     }
00183 
00184         return 0;
00185 }

00187 int Socket_Init(void){
00188 
00189         int sockfd, port;
00190         struct sockaddr_in   server_addr;
00191         char *host;
00192         
00193         host = conf_get("server_ip");
00194         port = atoi(conf_get("server_port"));
00195 
00196         bzero(&server_addr, sizeof(server_addr));
00197         inet_pton(AF_INET, host, &(server_addr.sin_addr));
00198         server_addr.sin_family = AF_INET;
00199         server_addr.sin_port = htons(port);
00200 
00201         sockfd = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, 0);
00202 
00203         if (-1 == sockfd) {return(-1);}
00204         
00205         if (-1 == Set_SockOpt(sockfd)) {
00206                 close(sockfd);
00207                 return (-1);
00208         }
00209 
00210         if (-1 == bind(sockfd, (struct sockaddr *)&server_addr, sizeof(server_addr))) {
00211                 close(sockfd);
00212                 return(-1);
00213         }
00214     if (-1 == listen(sockfd, MAXCONN)) {
00215                 close(sockfd);
00216                 return(-1);
00217         }
00218         
00219         return (sockfd);
00220 }

00222 int Client_Init(char *host, int port){
00223         int flag = 1, client_fd;
00224         struct sockaddr_in to_server_addr;
00225 
00226     if((client_fd = socket(AF_INET , SOCK_STREAM , 0)) == - 1) {
00227         /*d_log("socket error") ;*/
00228         return (-1);
00229     }
00230 
00231     /* if(-1 == SetNonBlocking(client_fd)){
00232         printf("noblock error\n");
00233         close(client_fd);
00234         return (-1);
00235     }*/
00236     
00237     memset((char *)&to_server_addr, 0, sizeof(to_server_addr)) ;
00238     to_server_addr.sin_family = AF_INET;
00239     to_server_addr.sin_port = htons(port);
00240     to_server_addr.sin_addr.s_addr = inet_addr(host) ;
00241 
00242         if(connect(client_fd, (struct sockaddr *)&to_server_addr, sizeof(struct sockaddr)) == - 1) {
00243         printf("can't connect backend server\n");
00244         return (-1);
00245     }
00246    /*  if (setsockopt(client_fd, IPPROTO_TCP, TCP_NODELAY,
00247                   &flag, sizeof(flag)) == -1) {
00248         printf("noblock SockOpt\n");
00249                 return (-1);
00250     }*/
00251     //SetUnsetBlocking(client_fd); 
00252         return client_fd;
00253 }

00255 size_t Socket_Read(int c_fd, void *buf, ssize_t len){
00256     size_t nread;
00257     ssize_t offset=0, stop=0;
00258     
00259     do{
00260         nread = read(c_fd, buf+offset, (len-offset));
00261         if(nread < 0){
00262             if ( errno == EINTR || errno == EAGAIN){
00263                 continue;
00264             }else return -1;
00265         }else if(nread == 0){
00266             return -1;
00267         }else{
00268             offset += nread;
00269             
00270             if(offset == len) stop=1;
00271         }
00272 
00273     }while(!stop);
00274 
00275     return nread;
00276 }
00277 
00278 size_t Socket_Send(int c_fd, const void *buf, ssize_t len){
00279         ssize_t stop=0, offset=0;
00280     size_t nsend;
00281         const void *sBuf = buf;
00282 
00283         
00284     if(c_fd < 1) return -1;
00285     if(len < 1) return -1;
00286     if(sBuf == NULL) return -1;
00287 
00288         do{
00289                 nsend = write(c_fd, sBuf+offset, (len-offset));
00290                 if(nsend < 0)
00291                 {
00292                         if(errno == EAGAIN || errno == EINTR)
00293                         {
00294                                 continue;
00295                         }
00296                 }else if(nsend == 0)return -1;  
00297         
00298         offset += nsend;
00299         if(offset == len) stop = 1;
00300 
00301         }while(!stop);
00302 
00303         return offset;
00304 }

00307         close(sock_fd);
00308 }
